Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: læa phwk khea khearph bucha xun ca kxallxh tux sing thi mimi xanac hı paccay yangchiph kæ phwk khea cak chan fa thanghlay læa phændin tæ xyang dı læa phwk man k mi samarth kratha di
dangnan phwk cea xya yk xuthahrn thang hla ykabxallxhˌ ley thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng rxbru læa phwk cea miru thea phraxngkh

xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn thung baw phu pen thas mimi xanac nı sing dı kab phu thi rea di hı paccay yangchiph thi di cak rea kæ khea læw khea k bricakh man doy thang lab læa peidphey phwk khea ca theatheiym kan la hrux brrda kar srrseriy pen khx ngxallxhˌ tæthwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru

læa xallxhˌ thrng yk xuthahrn thung chay sxng khn hnung nı sxng khn pen bı khea mi samarth nı sing dı læa khea pen phara kæ nay khxng khea xik dwy mi wa hæng dı thi nay ca sng khea pi khea ca mi na khwam di dı «ma ley khea ca theatheiym kab phu kachab nı thang thi theiyngthrrm læa khea xyu nı thang thi theiyngtrng kranan hrux

Læa che phaaxallxhˌ (thrng ru) sing phn yan wisay hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa reuxng thi keiyw kab wan sin lok nan michı xun dı nxkcak pheiyng chaw phribtadeiyw hrux man kıl (rew) ying kwa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing

læa xallxhˌ thrng hı phwk cea xxk cak khrrph marda khxng phwk cea doy phwk cea miru xari ley læa phraxngkh thrng thahı phwk cea diyin læa hen læa mi hawcı (sahrab nuk læa khid) pheux phwk cea ca di khxbkhun

phwk khea mi hen fung nk dxk hrux wa phwk man di rab khwam sadwk nı hwng xakas hæng chan fa mimi phu dı dung phwk man wi di nxk ca kxallxhˌ thæcring nı kar nan nænxn yxm pen sayyan mak hlay sahrab klum chn phu sraththa
